title: Drawing, "Design for Armchair in Sycamore Wood", ca. 1927
medium: Graphite, blue, yellow watercolor, white gouache on illustration board
markings: Stamps: blind stamp, upper right: EB
inscribed: inscribed in graphite, upper left corner: 2 (encircled) $800; in graphite at lower right: 1 (encircled) / E. Boiceau; in graphite, lower left corner: Bois sycamore / Galuchat en [---] / les Bordures / Gar [---] satin.
dimensions:
18.1 x 27 cm (7 1/8 x 10 5/8 in.)
DIMS TO BE CHECKED
Mat:  45.7 x 35.6 cm (18 x 14 in.)
description: Low-slung armchair, crescent-shaped, sycamore wood trimmed in lizard, upholstered in satin, splayed tapered legs.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Design for Armchair in Sycamore Wood", ca. 1927. Graphite, blue, yellow watercolor, white gouache on illustration board. 1954-69-3.
